content: **keep in mind** there are countless patterns for earwarmers and headbands everywhere that come down to crocheting a long rectangle and sewing it shut i freehanded this one but it s so simple that there is a chance someone came up with something similar before i did so as well this pattern uses the **american crochet terminology** **hook size** = 5mm **yarn recommendation** weight 4 alize burcum klasik/batik about **85m or 93yds** you can also use thinner yarn with 5mm crochet hook to create a very lightweight headband **abbreviations** chain - chain half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet blo - back loop only st/sts - stitch/stitches **size of the finished headband lying flat ** 26cm x 10cm 10 2 x 4 any questions comments concerns feel free to contact me - kami crochet 1 1 https //linktr ee/kami_crochet
